session_info.name: THXA - Invited Oral Presentations, Beam Instrumentation, Controls, Feedback & Oper.

papers.title: Beam-Based Optimization of Storage Ring Nonlinear Beam Dynamics
papers.abstract: This paper will present considerations and algorithms for direct online optimization of the nonlinear beam dynamics of existing and future storage rings. The experimental setup and results from using this approach to improve the dynamic aperture of the
